She would use funds of the loan to buy goods, same as Mrs. Tường. Mrs. Minh would use funds of the loan to invest in poultry, same as Mrs. Trai.

Translated from Vietnamese by ngungo, Kiva volunteer.


Chị Phương, 37 tuổi đi chợ, chăn nuôi gà và bán hàng đồ khô, tạp hoá. Chồng chị đã mất nên chị rất vất vả. Chị phải nuôi ba con còn nhỏ. Các cháu đều đang đi học. Chị vay vốn để mua hàng khô bán. Chị Minh vay vốn để chăn nuôi. Chị Tường vay vốn để đi chợ. Chi Trai vay vốn để chăn nuôi.

loans.use: Buy goods

loans.name: Pirmahmad

texts.ru:
Pirmahmad U. lives in the Abdurahmon Jomi district of Tajikistan. For the last 5 years he has been raising and selling cattle. Pirmahmad purchases calves at the market, fattens them for 40 days and then sells them at the same market. This allows him to support his family. His business also supports the development of agriculture in the region as well as provides the locals with a source of fresh meat at reasonable prices. Pirmahmad is planning to use the loan to increase the number of calves he owns. He is planning to pay back the loan in the next 6 months.

Translated from Russian by Anya Lyuksyutova, Kiva volunteer

Убайдов Пирмахмад проживает в районеАбдурахмони Джоми .Занимается купле продажей крупно рогатого скота.Покупает бычков на рынке ,затем откармливает около 40 дней, после чего реализует на тех же рынках. Это позволяет клиенту обеспечивать свою семью, кроме того этот бизнес способствует развитию животноводческого сектора, что помогает населению покупать свежее мясо по доступным ценам. Занимается этим бизнесом клиент около 5 лет. Поэтому планирует получить кредит для того , чтобы увеличить поголовье продоваемых животных. Погасить кредит клиент планирует в течении 6 месяцев.

loans.use: Purchase of a calf

loans.name: Komilahon

texts.en: Komilahon N. is 22 years old and she lives in the Asht region of Tajikistan. She works in a collective farm but because it is seasonal, she also works selling perfumes. She is able to get a good assortment from direct suppliers and sells them for prices lower than those in the bazaar. Now Mrs. N. is applying to KIVA for a loan of $625.00 to develop her business.

loans.use: For developing her existing business

loans.name: Odil

texts.en:
B. Odil is 53 years old. He and his wife have raised 6 children, four living independently and two still at home.

Odil is a farmer, renting 2.0 hectares of  land and owning 0.18 hectares. The land is used to produce a variety of crops. As a rule, Odil purchases fertilizer and combustive lubricating materials required for processing the land. He also breeds cattle. Currently he has 8 head of cattle that he will soon sell. 

Odil requests a loan of $600.00 for the term of 9 months to be spent on the purchase of combustive-lubricating materials and fertilizer. He thanks all supporting him.

loans.use: To purchase combustive-lubricating materials and fertilizer.

loans.name: Kurbongul

texts.ru:
Kurbongul S. resides in the Abdurahmon Jomi district in Tajikistan. She is 41 years old, single and has 2 children. Kurbongul has a high school degree and no professional degree. For the last three years she has been selling groceries at the local market. She brings her goods from Dushanbe, capital of Tajikistan, where she purchases them from wholesalers. Kurbongul is planning to use the loan money to increase the assortment of goods she can offer at her market stand. Since she is not married, the whole burden of supporting a family lies on her shoulders and her business allows her to feed her children. The goods she sells at her stand allow the locals to purchase the necessary groceries cheaply and without having to leave their town. Kurbongul is planning to pay back the loan in the next 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Anya Lyuksyutova, Kiva volunteer.

Саидова Курбонгул жительница района Абдурахмони Джоми.возраст 41 год. Не замужем, имеет 2 детей.Образование среднее, специальности не имеет.Занимается торговлей продуктов питания на районном рынке.Работает в этой сфере около 3 лет. Привозит товар из Душанбе покупая товар у оптовых реализаторов.Так как клиентка не замужем обеспечение семьи лежит только на ее плечах, поэтому ее бизнес позволяет клиентке кормить ее семью. Кроме того товар привозимый ею помогает населению приобретать товар прямо в районе не выезжая из селения, а так же по доступным ценам. Погасить кредит клиентка планирует в течении 12 месяцев.

loans.use: Expanding the assortment of goods offered for sale

loans.name: Rano

texts.ru:
Rano M.lives in the Khurson region. She is 42 years old, married and has 3 children. She makes her living buying and selling livestock. Rano purchases sheep and goats, fattens them for 40-45 days and then sells them at the same market for a higher price. Fattened animals can be sold for a higher price since they most commonly are used for their meat. This business allows Rano to support her family. Her business also contributes to the development of agriculture in her region and allows the locals to purchase fresh meat at reasonable prices. Rano is planning to pay back the loan in the next 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Anya Lyuksyutova, Kiva volunteer.

Меликова Рано проживает в районе Хуросон. Возраст 42 года , замужем имеет 3 детей.Занимается купле продажей мелко рогатого скота.Покупает овец и коз на рынке ,затем откармливает около 40-45 дней, после чего реализует на тех же рынках по более высокой цене.. Откормленные животные стоят дороже , так как чаще всего их используют на мясо. Это позволяет клиентке обеспечивать свою семью, а так же этот бизнес способствует развитию животноводческого сектора, что помогает населению покупать свежее мясо по доступным ценам. Погасить кредит клиентка планирует в течении 12 месяцев.

loans.use: Purchase of goats and sheep

loans.name: Rahmonkul

texts.ru:
Rahmonkul S. lives in the region of Khuroson. He is 53 years old, married and has six children. He is in the business of buying and selling cattle. He buys calves on the market and then feeds them for about 40 days and later resells them on the same market. This allows Rahmonkul to support his family as he is the sole provider. This business also facilitates the development of agriculture which provides the local residents with fresh meat at reasonable prices. Rahmonkul plans to pay off the loan within 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer.

Шодиев Рахмонкул проживает в районе Хуросон. Возраст 53 года, женат имеет6 детей.Занимается купле продажей крупно рогатого скота.Покупает бычков на рынке ,затем откармливает около 40 дней, после чего реализует на тех же рынках. Это позволяет клиенту обеспечивать свою семью , так как он является единственным кормильцем своей семьи. Кроме того этот бизнес способствует развитию животноводческого сектора, что помогает населению свежее покупать мясо по доступным ценам. Погасить кредит клиент планирует в течении 12 месяцев.

loans.use: To buy a calf

loans.name: Bahoraly

texts.en: Bahoraly K. was born in 1974 in the Asht region and he is married and has seven children. Mr. K. sells household wares and has a good assortment at prices that bring him repeat customers. He used a prior loan to improve his business of six years and to open a trade outlet. Now Mr. K. is requesting a loan of $625.00 to purchase new goods and to increase the variety he offers.

loans.use: To buy new goods and broaden his assortment of wares

loans.name: Mahmadaly

texts.ru:
Mahmadaly Turaevich B. lives in the region of Khuroson. He is 40 years old, married and has 3 children. He has secondary education. Mahmadaly owns a grocery store in his kishlak (village). He brings the merchandise from Dushanbe (capital of Tajikistan) from wholesalers and resells at this store. This allows the local residents to buy groceries in their kishlak without having to travel to outside markets and spending extra money. This business is the only source of income for Mahmadaly's family and that's why it's very well set up. He plans to use the loan to increase the capital turnover and sales. He plans to pay off the loan within 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer.

Бобоев Махмадали Тураевич житель района Хуросон. Возраст 40 лет, женат имеет 3 детей. Образование среднее. Занимается торговлей продуктов питания.Имеет магазин в своем кишлаке , завозит товар из города Душанбе приобретая у оптовых реализаторов и продает со своего магазина. Это позволяет населению делать покупки прямо в кишлаке не выезжая на рынки и не тратя деньги на дорогу. Этот бизнес является основным источником дохода его семьи, поэтому его бизнес хорошо налажен.Клиент планирует получить кредит для того чтобы увеличить товарооборот.Погасить кредит клиент планирует в течении 12 месяцев

loans.use: To increase sales

loans.name: Abdurashid

texts.en:
M. Abdurashid is 58 years old. He and his wife have raised 2 children.

Abdurashid has been selling flowers for 15 years in the central market of the city, working from early morning till late night. Once every two weeks Abdurashid travels to the neighboring country of Uzbekistan to purchase his flowers. Over the years, he has become an expert in his business, even knowing how to save flowers during the severe winters. This business is successful, generating a stable income for the family. 

Abdurashid requests a loan of $1000.00 for the term of 8 months to purchase additional flowers for his business. Abdurashid thanks all for supporting him and promises to be punctual in loan repayment.

loans.use: To purchase flowers to sell.

loans.name: Zafar

texts.en:
K. Zafar, 27 years old, is married with one child.

Zafar has been selling men’s clothing for five years.  He began as an employee, but over time he saved some money, sold his car and started his own business. He has become a very experienced entrepreneur, working hard to keep his clients happy. The business is successful and generates a stable income for the family. 

Zafar requests a loan of $600.00 for a term of 9 months to purchase additional new men’s clothing for sale.  He thanks everyone supporting him and promises to repay the loan on time.

loans.use: To increase the stock of men's clothing for sale.

loans.name: Nozanin

texts.ru:
Nozanin S. is a resident of the town of Yavan. She is 32 years old, divorced and has 2 children. She has no education. She has a retail business and sells products for home like tableware and other basic home appliances at the Yavan market. She brings the merchandise from Dushanbe (capital of Tajikistan) and resells it on the market where she has a vendor point. She travels for merchandise once every ten days. She also has three years experience in this field. Nozanin wants to buy a different variety of merchandise and that is what she needs the loan for. Her business is the only source of income for her family. The business also provides the residents of Yavan with the option of doing shopping in their town at reasonable prices. Nozanin plans to pay off the loan within 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer.

Шарипова Нозанин жительница горда Яван.Возраст 32 года. Разведена имеет 2 детей.Образования не имеет.Занимается торговлей хозяйственных товаров ( посуда , другие бытовые приборы.)на рынке Явана. Привозит товар из города Душанбе и сама же его реализует на базаре. Имеет торговую точку на районном рынке города Яван. За товаром клиентка выезжает один раз в 10 дней. Опыт работы в данной деятельности около трех лет.Клиентка хочет завести новый ассортимент товара, поэтому она планирует получить кредит.Ее бизнес является единственным источником дохода ее семьи.Кроме того ее деятельность позволяет жителям Явана делать покупки не выезжая из города по доступным ценам.Погасить кредит клиентка планирует в течении 12 месяцев.

loans.use: To buy new merchandise

loans.name: Zamirahon

texts.en: Zamirahon M. lives in the Asht region of Tajikistan and she is married and has three children. Mrs. M. works in the family business of raising and selling livestock. This work brings her family income but she works also as a toastmaster for wedding parties. Now Mrs. M. is applying to KIVA for a business development loan of $1,200.00 to purchase a pedigreed bull and ram.

loans.use: To purchase a pedigreed bull and ram

loans.name: Yermahmad

texts.ru:
Yermahmad A. lives in the region of Khuroson. He is 50 years old, married and has five children. He is a barber by profession and owns a barber shop in his kishlak (village). He has been in this business for the past ten years. Yermahmad wants to improve the quality of his services by purchasing new equipment and appliances like a blow drier, hair trimmers, mirrors and such and that is why he needs the loan. There are no other barber shops in the kishlak and that is why his services are in such high demand among the residents. His business also helps to support for his family as Yermahmad is the sole provider. He plans to pay off the loan within 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer.

Аюбов Ермахмад житель района Хуросон. Возраст 50 лет. Женат имеет 5 детей.Образование средне специальное . По профессии парикмахер.Имеет частную парикмахерскую в своем кишлаке.Занимается этим видом бизнеса около 10 лет. Хочет улучшить качество обслуживания путем приобретения новой технологии. Хочет приобрести парикмахерские наборы(фен, машинки ,зеркала идр.) Поэтому планирует получить кредит.Его парикмахерская является единственной в данном кишлаке, поэтому продаваемые им услуги пользуются спросом у населения.Кроме того его бизнес позволяет обеспечивать семью, т.к. клиент является единственным кормильцем . Погасить кредит клиент планирует в течении 10 месяцев.

loans.use: To buy new equipment

loans.name: Saidhudja

texts.ru:
Saidhudja U. lives in the region of Abdurahmon Jomi. He is 49 years old, married and has 4 children. He has a secondary technical education and is a carpenter by profession. He is in the animal husbandry business. He buys young calves, feeds them for about 40-45 days and then resells at a higher price because grown calves cost more and are used for meat. Afterwards he buys new batch of calves, feeds them and then resells and that is the scheme by which his business runs. This business helps to support his family as Saidhudja is the sole provider. Besides, the development of animal husbandry in the region provides the markets with fresh meat at reasonable prices. Saidhudja has been in this business for the past five years. He plans to use the loan to buy more calves. He plans to pay off the loan within 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer.

Юсупов Саидхуджа житель района Абдурахмони Джоми. Возраст 49 лет, женат, имеет 4 детей.Образование средне- техническое. По специальности плотник. Занимается животноводством. Покупает молодых бычков , откармливает около 40-45 ддней а затем продает по более высокой цене, так как откормленные и подросшие бычки стоят дороже и их используют на мясо.Затем он покупает новый молодняк , откармливает и продает. Так по этой схеме действует его бизнес.Этот бизнес помогает обеспечивать его семью так как клиент является единственным кормильцем семьи. Кроме того развитие животноводческого сектора позволяет обеспечить рынки полноценным мясом и по доступным ценам.Занимается животноводством клиент уже около 5 лет.Поэтому клиент планирует получить кредит для того чтобы купить бычков. Погасить кредит клиент планирует в течении 10 месяцев.

loans.use: To buy calves

loans.name: Jurabek

texts.ru:
Jurabek S. lives in the region of Abdurahmon Jomi. He is 52 years old, married and has five children. He has secondary education and no profession. He is in the animal husbandry business. He buys young calves, feeds them for about 40-45 days and then resells them at a higher price because grown and fed calves cost more and are used for meat. He then buys new batch of calves, feeds them and resells and that is the scheme by which runs his business. It allows to support his family because Jurabek is the sole provider. Besides, the development of animal husbandry provides markets with fresh mean at reasonable prices. Jurabek has been in this business for the past five years. He plans to use the loan to buy more calves. He plans to pay off the loan within 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer.

Сидмухиддинов Джурабек житель района Абдурахмони Джоми. Возраст 52 года,женат, имеет 5 детей.Образование среднее. Специальности не имеет.Занимается животноводством. Покупает молодых бычков , откармливает около 40-45 ддней а затем продает по более высокой цене, так как откормленные и подросшие бычки стоят дороже и их используют на мясо.Затем он покупает новый молодняк , откармливает и продает. Так по этой схеме действует его бизнес.Этот бизнес помогает обеспечивать его семью так как клиент является единственным кормильцем семьи. Кроме того развитие животноводческого сектора позволяет обеспечить рынки полноценным мясом и по доступным ценам.Занимается животноводством клиент уже около 5 лет.Поэтому клиент планирует получить кредит для того чтобы купить бычков. Погасить кредит клиент планирует в течении 10 месяцев.

loans.use: To buy calves

loans.name: Saidniso

texts.en:
M. Saidniso, 41 years old, is married with four children.

Saidniso has been selling colorful plastic bags for 2 years in the central market. Her customers are mainly the people purchasing goods in the market.  This stable business generates significant income for the family. 

Saidniso requests a loan of $600.00 for the term of 9 months. The funds are needed to increase the range of goods for sale. Saidniso is grateful to all lending to her and promises to pay the loan on time.

loans.use: To increase the range of goods for sale.

loans.name: Zarnigor

texts.en:
K. Zarnigor is 35 years old and raising two children by herself.

Zarnigor has been in business for 10 years as a seamstress making oriental dresses and pants.  The business generates a stable income for the family and is now ready for expansion. 

She is requesting a loan of $950.00 for a 9 month term  to purchase more fabrics required to sew the national dresses and pants. This is the first loan Zarnigor has requested and she thanks all supporting her and promises to be timely in loan repayment.

loans.use: To purchase fabrics for sewing the national dresses and pants.

loans.name: Mairam

texts.en: Mairam A. was born in 1962 in the Asht region and she is married and has four children. Mrs. A. works in a collective farm but because it is seasonal work, she also has had a business for five years making and selling yarn and warm socks. She has been a client of MicroInvest since 2007 when she applied for financial support to improve her business. Mrs. A. is applying to KIVA for a business development loan of $625.00 to buy special yarn-making equipment.

loans.use: To purchase special yarn-making equipment

loans.name: Rajabmurod

texts.ru:
Rajabmurod Safaralievich N. lives in the region of Abdurahmon Jomi. He is 59 years old, married and has seven children. He has secondary education and no profession. He is in the animal husbandry business. He buys young calves, feeds them for about 40-45 days and then resells them at a higher price because grown and fed calves cost more and are used for meat. He then buys new batch of calves, feeds them and resells and that is the scheme by which runs his business. It allows to support his family because Rajabmurod is the sole provider. Besides, the development of animal husbandry provides markets with fresh mean at reasonable prices. Rajabmurod has been in this business for the past six years. He plans to use the loan to buy more calves. He plans to pay off the loan within 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer.

Назаров Раджабмурод Сафаралиевич житель района Абдурахмони Джоми. Возраст 59 лет, женат, имеет 7 детей.Образование среднее.Специальности не имеет. Занимается животноводством. Покупает молодых бычков , откармливает около 40-45 ддней а затем продает по более высокой цене, так как откормленные и подросшие бычки сточт дороже и их используют на мясо.Затем он покупает новый молодняк , откармливает и продает. Так по этой схеме действует его бизнес.Этот бизнес помогает обеспечивать его семью так как клиент является единственным кормильцем семьи. Кроме того развитие животноводческого сектора позволяет обеспечить рынки полноценным мясом и по доступным ценам.Занимается животноводством клиент уже около 6 лет.Поэтому клиент планирует получить кредит для того чтобы купить бычков. Погаситькредит клиент планирует в течении 10 месяцев.

loans.use: To buy calves

loans.name: Eza Aldeen

texts.en:
The entrepreneur is 28 years old. He is married and has two children. One of them is four years old, and the other is one year old. He is living in his parents' rented house. He has a small shop of glassware, and he applied to borrow $1000 to purchase new glassware and more home supplies. He also wants to make new shelves and paint the shop to expand his project. He wants to increase his income to save for a better life for his family.

Disclaimer: This entrepreneur is from a volatile region where the security situation remains unsettled. Lenders to this business should be aware that this loan may represent a higher risk and accept this additional risk in making their loan.

Note: Personally identifiable attributes of this entrepreneur have been altered to protect him or her (i.e. blacking out portions of the entrepreneur in his/her picture, altering his/her first or last name, etc.).

loans.use: Purchase new glassware

loans.name: Mohammad Aslam

texts.en: Mohammad Aslam lives in district 5 of Kabul, Afghanistan. He is married and has 2 children. He is an educated man. Mohamman has a bakery, which he has owned in for 10 years. He now has 10 years of good experience and involvement in this business, and has good contacts with restaurants and with local people. He would like to expand his business, so he has requested an individual loan to increase his inventory. He would be happy to make a good income to support his family and improve has business.

loans.use: To buy inventory for his bakery

loans.name: Tuhtabibi

texts.en: Tuhtabibi T. is 39 years old and she lives in the Asht region of Tajikistan. She works in a collective farm, but because it is seasonal work,  she also works in the family business of raising and selling livestock. She also works making yarn and warm socks. Mrs. T. has been a client of MicroInvest since 2007 and thanks to her loans, she improved her eight-year-old yarn and sock business. She is applying to KIVA for a loan of $1,200.00 for business development.

loans.use: For business development

loans.name: Asomiddin

texts.ru:
Asomiddin Safarof lives in the village Abdurahmon Jomi. He is 47 years old, married, and has 6 children. He has a high school education. He has been in the business of cattle breeding for 9 years. He purchases young bulls, feeds them intensively for 40-45 days, and resells at higher prices as those bulls cost more and are used later on for meat. After that, he purchases new bulls and repeats the process - that is how his business works. This business helps him to maintain his family, since this is a single main source of income for Asomiddin's whole family. Apart from that, development of these types of businesses help to supply markets with good meat at moderate prices. He plans to pay off the credit within 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer.

Сафаров Асомуддин Исоевич житель района Абдурахмони Джоми. Возраст 47 лет, женат, имеет 6 детей.Образование среднее.Специальности не имеет. Занимается животноводством. Покупает молодых бычков , откармливает около 40-45 ддней а затем продает по более высокой цене, так как откормленные и подросшие бычки стоят дороже и их используют на мясо.Затем он покупает новый молодняк , откармливает и продает. Так по этой схеме действует его бизнес.Этот бизнес помогает обеспечивать его семью так как клиент является единственным кормильцем семьи. Кроме того развитие животноводческого сектора позволяет обеспечить рынки полноценным мясом и по доступным ценам.Занимается животноводством клиент уже около 9 лет.Поэтому клиент планирует получить кредит для того чтобы купить бычков. Погаситькредит клиент планирует в течении 10 месяцев.

loans.use: To purchase a young bull

loans.name: Mahmutaly

texts.en: Mahmutaly K. works in a collective farm but he has also been in the business of making yarn and warm socks for 10 years. He used a prior loan to improve his business and paid the loan back on time. Now, Mr. K. requests a loan of $625.00 to purchase special yarn-making equipment.

loans.use: To purchase special yarn-making equipment

loans.name: Adinajon

texts.en: Adinajon A. lives in the Asht region and she is married and has five children. Mrs. A. has a home business raising and selling livestock, as well as making yarn and warm socks, which she has been doing for ten years. She also works in a collective farm. Mrs. A. is applying to KIVA for a business development loan of $350.00 to purchase special yarn dyes.

loans.use: To purchase special yarn dyes

loans.name: Rajabaly

texts.ru:
Rajabaly G. lives in the village Abdurahmon Jomi. He is 36 years old, married, and has 4 children. He has a bachelors degree in Economics. He is in the business of selling construction supplies. She has his own store in the village that he lives in. He has been in this business for the last 7 years. He wants to obtain a loan to purchase additional amount of inventory. As the spring comes in and the weather becomes warmer, many local residents start fixing their houses. For this reason he anticipates higher demand and sales. His store is the only store of that type in the village that he lives in, and that is why Rajabaly helps people to make necessary purchases without going to a bigger city. Aside from that, this is the primary source of income for Rajabaly. He plans to pay off the credit within 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer.

Гурезов Раджабали Шералиевич проживает в районе Абдурахмони Джоми. Возраст 35 лет, женат имеет 4 детей. Образование высшее по специальности экономист.Занимается торговлей Стройматериалов. Имеет магазин в своем кишлаке.Опыт работы в данной сфере 7 лет.Хочет получить кредит для того чтобы увеличить товарооборот, в связи с приходом весны.Весной с наступлением сухой погоды население начинает ремонтировать свое жилье, поэтому увеличивается спрос на стройматериалы и увеличивается объем продаж. Его магазин является единственным магазином такого рода ,поэтому клиент помогает населению делать покупки не выезжая за приделы селения.Кроме того этот бизнес является основным источником дохода его семьи. Погасить кредит клиент планирует за 10 месяцев.

loans.use: To increase the amount of inventory

loans.name: Rahila

texts.en:
M. Rahila is 52 years old. She and her husband raised four children who are now living independently.

Rahila is a farmer who, with her husband, has 2 hectares of land on which she grows crops including rice, onions, and wheat.  She generally produces enough crops both to feed the family and to market. Rahila is applying to IMON for a loan of $600 for a 9 month term to purchase the fertilizer and combustive – lubricating materials required for processing the land.  She thereby hopes to produce a richer yield that she will sell in the market at prices attractive to her customers.

loans.use: To purchase the fertilizer and combustive-lubricating materials required for processing the land.

loans.name: Robiya

texts.en: Robiya A. lives in the Asht region and she is married and has six children. Mrs. A. works in a collective farm, but she has a home business of raising and selling livestock. She also makes yarn and warm socks and has done so for ten years. Now, Mrs. A. is applying to KIVA for a business development loan of $625.00 to purchase special yarn-making equipment.

loans.use: To purchase special yarn-making equipment

loans.name: Nasim

texts.en:
N. Nasim, 26 years old, is married and the father of a one year old child. 

Nasim has run his business of office supplies sales for more than 11 years in the central market. He competes effectively with big stores by offering prices that are lower and more attractive. This has helped him to succeed in his business.

Nasim requests a loan of $1000.00 for the term of 9 months to expand the business and purchase more office supplies to sell.

loans.use: To expand the business and purchase additional office supplies to sell.

loans.name: Nor Agha

texts.en: Nor Agha lives with his family in district 5 of Kabul, Afghanistan. He is married and has a small gas and fuel shop. He started this business last year. It is still doing well, and he wants to enlarge has shop, so he has requested an individual loan to buy more fuel and gas for his shop. He hopes to attract good numbers of clients and make good income to help his family. He is happy about the AFSG small group loans in Afghanistan.

loans.use: To buy more fuel and gas

loans.name: Zafar

texts.ru:
Zafar E. lives in the city of Dushanbe. He is 35 years old, married, and has 2 children. He has college education. He works in GAUP "Tajik Air" as a shooter (she shoots birds so they would not interfere with airplanes). He asks for a credit to fix his house as it is very hard for him to accumulate the needed amount of money on his own. A better way for him is to obtain a loan and repay it using his regular income within 14 months. This will give him an opportunity to fix his house and live in better conditions.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer.

Элодов Зафар Хаетович житель города Душанбе. Возраст 35 лет Женат имеет 2 детей. Образование соредне- техническое. Работает в ГАУП «Таджик Эйр» работает стрелком.(стреляет в птиц , чтобы не мешали самолетам). Запрашивает кредит на ремонт дома, т.к. сам скопить на ремонт он не может , ему удобнее получить кредит и с заработной платы погашатьего в течении 14 месяцев. Это даст возможность ему отремантировать жилье и жить в хороших условиях.

loans.use: To fix the house

loans.name: Ruzigul

texts.ru:
Ruzigul S. lives in the town of Vahdat. She is 53 years old and has 5 children. She has high school education. She does not have any other source of income except for the proceeds from sales of milk from the cow that she currently has. She has been in this business for the last 6 years. She plans to use the loan towards a purchase of another milk cow. She will be able to increase her income by selling more milk. At this time, the prices for cattle are low because of the general lack of cattle food. Thus, this will be a profitable purchase for Ruzigul and for the local residents, who will be able to purchase fresh milk at good prices. She will be paying off the loan within the next 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer.

Сафарбекова Рузигул жительца города Вахдат. Возраст 53 года, вдова , имеет 5 детей.Образование среднее. Нигде не работает. Занимается животноводством.Имеет дойную корову, молоко которой использует для семьи и для реализации. Опыт работы в данной сфере около 6 лет. Планирует получить кредит , для того чтобы купить еще одну корову и получаемое молоко продавать, тем самым увеличив доход. В данный момент цены на КРС упали т.к в феврале у населения обычно кончается корм, поэтому данная покупка может быть выгодна для клиентки, а так же для населения ,которое сможет покупать свежее молоко и по доступным ценам. Погасить кредит клиентка планирует в течении 10 месяцев.

loans.use: To purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Sharifgul

texts.ru:
Sharifgul J. lives in the town of Vahdat. She is a 50 year old widow with 6 children. She has high school education. She works in a child care facility as an administrator. She also holds a cattle business. She has a single milk cow, whose milk she uses for her family and for resale. She has been in this business for the last 6 years. Using the credit, she plans to purchase another milk cow and to sell its milk; thus, increasing her overall income. Currently, the prices for cattle are low because of a lack of cattle food. For this reason, this purchase will be profitable for Sharifgul and will also benefit local residents, who will be able to purchase fresh milk at good prices. She will be paying off the load during the next 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer.

Джалилова Шарифгул жительница города Вахдат. Возраст 50 года, вдова , имеет 6 детей.Образование среднее. Работает в детском саду -завхозом. Занимается животноводством. Имеет дойную корову, молоко которой использует для семьи и для реализации. Опыт работы в данной сфере около 6 лет. Планирует получить кредит , для того чтобы купить еще одну корову и получаемое молоко продавать, тем самым увеличив доход. В данный момент цены на КРС упали т.к в феврале у населения обычно кончается корм, поэтому данная покупка может быть выгодна для клиентки, а так же для населения ,которое сможет покупать свежее молоко и по доступным ценам. Погасит кредит клиентка планирует в течении 10 месяцев.

loans.use: To purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Temor Shah

texts.en: Temor Shah lives in district 5 of Kabul, Afghanistan with five members of his family. He is single. His father died during the war in Kabul. He is the only breadwinner for his family. Temor has a retail shop. He wants to expand his business, so he requested an individual loan to buy extra materials like oil, rice, telephone cards, baskets, and shampoos, to complete his inventory and improve his business. He is happy and he would like to thank Kiva lenders who help poor people around the world.

loans.use: To buy more supplies like oil, rice, and telephone cards for his grocery store

loans.name: Olufta

texts.en:
Z. Olufta, 36 years old, is married with three children.

Olufta has run her lingerie business for about 10 years. Her trading place is located in the local market, and this business generates the main income for the family, as her husband does not earn much. 

Olufta has borrowed money several times in the past and has proven herself as a reliable client. She is requesting a loan of $1000.00 for a term of 6 months in order to enlarge the range of goods she sells. Olufta thanks everyone supporting her and promises to manage the loan responsibly.

loans.use: To increase the range of goods for sale in her business.

loans.name: Zohir

texts.en:
S. Zohir, 38 years old, is married with three children.

Zohir sells flowers in the central market and has many clients due to the service and wide range of flowers he provides. He usually travels to neighboring Uzbekistan to purchase the flowers once every two weeks. This stable business has been in operation for more than 18 years and generates considerable income for the family. 

Zohir requests a loan of $800.00 for a term of 8 months to purchase more flowers. He thanks all for their support and promises to repay the loan on time.

loans.use: To purchase flowers to sell.

loans.name: Sanobar

texts.en: Sanobar S. was born in 1963 in the Asht region and she is married and has five children. She supports her family by her home business of making and selling the national bread, lepeshky. Mrs. S. repaid a previous loan that she took out to improve her business. Now, Mrs. S. is applying to KIVA for a business development loan of $625.00 to buy more flour and increase her production.

loans.use: To buy flour and increase production.

loans.name: Abdumajid

texts.en:
B. Abdumajid, 54 years old, is married with four children. 

Abdumajid has been in the taxi business for 15 years, and it is the main source of income for his family. He is planning to fix his car in order to provide higher quality service in the future, and for this purpose he requests $1200.00 for the term of 9 months. Abdumajid thanks all supporting him and promises to repay the loan on time.

loans.use: Car repairs.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
This is 40 year-old Grace K.. She is married with two children, aged 14 and 17.

In 2005, Grace established a seamstress business. Working 1 to 4 hours a day, seven days a week, she earns about $10 per month from this business. Grace has already received and successfully repaid one loan from SELFINA, and now requires a new loan in order to purchase material and sewing accessories which she will use to sew new stock. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately $15. In the future, Grace also plans to increase the quantity and range of her stock. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To purchase material and sewing accessories in order to sew new items for sale.

loans.name: Sotkinboy

texts.en: Sotkinboy U. was born in 1949 in the Asht region of the Tajikistan and he is engaged in the home business of raising and selling livestock. In this family business, he has a large flock of cows and rams, and his wife works making sour milk products, as well as yarn. Mr. U. is applying to KIVA for a business development loan of $625.00 to pay for a new building to house his cows.

loans.use: For a new livestock building

loans.name: Ni Komang Notri

texts.id:
Living in a very humble house with brick wall has not discouraged Ni Komang Notri and her family to go through life. The humble life has made her more driven to make a better living by breeding goats. She started this business as her neighbourhood has abundant food supply for breeding goats. Due to the limited capital, Ni Komang Notri only raises 4 goats. The goat cost Rp. 300,000 each and it can be sold 5 months later with price of Rp. 600,000 - Rp. 700,000 each so she can get profit of Rp. 800,000 after deducting the maintenance cost. Although the profit is not much, Ni Koming Notri is still grateful that she can support the family's economy thanks to this business. Furthermore, her wish to renovate her house has encouraged her even more to save some of the profit. After getting the loan from DINARI, Ni Komang Notri becomes more enthusiastic in the business and she wants to buy 3 more female goats so that she can breed more goat offsprings and she doesn't need to buy more goat offsprings. She hopes with this she can gain more profit so that she can make a better living for the family.

Translated from Indonesian by Kustini Lim, Kiva volunteer.

Tinggal di rumah yang sangat sederhana yang hanya berdinding bata tidak membuat Ni Komang Notri dan keluarganya patah semangat dalam menjalani kehidupan. Segala kesederhanaan itu justru membuatnya bersemangat dalam bekerja untuk bisa hidup lebih baik lagi yaitu dengan memelihara kambing. Hal ini dilakukannya mengingat situasi lingkungan yang mendukung yaitu dengan tersedianya pakan yang cukup bagi keperluan ternaknya ini. Terbatasnya modal yang dimiliki mengharuskan Ni Komang Notri hanya memelihara 4 ekor Kambing . Kambing itu dibeli dengan harga Rp. 300.000 per ekor,- dan dalam waktu 5 bulan berhasil dijualnya dengan harga Rp. 600.000,- Rp.700.000 per ekor sehingga keuntungan bersih yang diperolehnya Rp. 800.000,- setelah dikurangi biaya pemeliharaan. Walaupun keuntungan yang diperolehnya tidak banyak tapi Ni Komang Notri tetap bersyukur karena keluarganya bisa hidup dari hasil usahanya tersebut. Keinginan untuk merenovasi rumahnya membuat Ni Komang Notri terpacu untuk mulai menyisihkan sedikit hasil usahanya ini.. Setelah menerima pinjaman modal usaha dari DINARI Ni Komang Notri menjadi lebih bersemangat lagi dalam usahanya dan ingin membeli 3 ekor induk kambing agar nantinya induk kambing ini mempunyai anak dan Ni Komang Notri tidak perlu membeli bibit untuk kambing penggemukan lagi ia hanya memelihara anak tersebut,dengan harapan keuntungan yang diperoleh akan lebih meningkat dan keluarganya bisa sejahtera.

loans.use: To purchase female goats

loans.name: Ni Komang Situasi

texts.id:
In this difficult time, Ni Komang Situasi finds it hard to be able to put her 4 children to school. Moreover her husband’s income as farmer is not enough to meet the family daily needs and profit from her kiosk can only enough to support her kitchen expenses at home. Fortunately Dinari gives her loan so she can expand her business by selling staple necessities. She uses the loan to buy rice, sugar, eggs, and other staple foods. She is hoping that the profit will increase then she can keep her children at school and save some to improve her kitchen. She works tirelessly; opening her kiosk from 7 AM until 10 PM. Ni Komang Situasi does this full hearted and full of spirit only to get her children better and higher education as possible and assure them better future than she is.

Translated from Indonesian by Iman Persada, Kiva volunteer.

Dalam situasi ekonomi seperti sekarang ini sangat sulit bagi Ni Komang Situasi untuk bisa menyekolahkan keempat anaknya. Apalagi penghasilan suaminya sebagai petani tidak mencukupi untuk memenuhi kebutuhan keluarga. Sedangkan keuntungan yang diperoleh dari warungnya selama ini hanya cukup dipakai untuk keperluan dapur. Untungnya Dinari memberi pinjaman modal sehingga Ni Komang Situasi bisa memperbesar usaha warungnya dengan berjualan kebutuhan pokok. Pinjaman ini dipergunakan untuk membeli beras,gula pasir,telor,maupun kebutuhan pokok lainnya. Hal ini diharapkan agar keuntungan yang diperoleh menjadi bertambah sehingga anak-anaknya tetap bisa sekolah dan sedikit demi sedikit Komang Situasi berharap bisa menabung karena ia ingin memperbaiki dapurnya yang selama ini masih berdinding bede dan berlantai tanah. Oleh sebab itu Komang Situasi tidak mengenal lelah,ia berjualan dari pagi pukul 07.00 wita dan baru tutup pada pukul 22.00 wita. Ni Komang Situasi melakukan usaha ini dengan sepenuh hati dan bersemangat karena ia ingin anak – anaknya dapat menempuh pendidikan setinggi mungkin agar masa depan mereka lebih baik dari yang dialaminya sekarang.

loans.use: Additional to working capital to buy more goods and improve kiosk condition

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for DINARI Foundation - Oct 23, 2008)

loans.name: Hj. Minah

texts.en: Hj. Minah is 53 years old and married to H.Q., who has no regular job. To meet her family's needs, she earns $5 a day selling clothing on credit door-to-door. Hj. Minah is a member of MBK and is asking for a loan of $125 to buy more clothes to sell. She will repay this loan within 12 months.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell to her customers

loans.name: Uminah

texts.en: Uminah is 49 years old and married to R., who has no steady job. Together, they have opened fresh-food stall to support their family, and they earn about $10 a day. Uminah is seeking a loan of $150 to expand this small business. She is a member of MBK, and will repay the loan within 12 months.

loans.use: To expand a fresh-food stall

loans.name: Ni Ketut Suadri

texts.id:
Living and working as a farmer in a village is common for the people of Bali, but for Ni Ketut Suadri farming is not entirely routine, but a truly important part of the life of her family. Her family depends on the what she grows. Up to this point, the most productive crop she has grown is cocoa trees. However, because of a change in the weather and climate due to global warming the production of cocoa in Bali has been changed. The biggest cocoa trees have undergone a decrease in the production of good fruit so that quality and quantity are under threat. The price for dried cocoa beans was once 14,000 Rupiah/kg and has now dropped drastically to 9,000 Rupiah/kg. Seeing this problem, Ni Ketut Suadri has worked hard to restore the condition of her cocoa trees to what they once were. Unfortunately, because of the limitations of her funding she can only do the most basic work like trimming and cleaning each tree. Ni Ketut Suadri would like to do more to help the production of her trees by purchasing fertilizer and temporary medicine to eradicate plant disease. Ni Ketut Suadri is optimistic that the treatment and fertilizer will create a much better environment for her trees and that they will quickly recover and produce fruit again.

Translated from Bahasa Indonesia by Courtenay Teska Race, Kiva Volunteer.

Menjalani hidup sebagai petani di lingkungan pedesaan adalah hal yang umum bagi warga masyarakat di Bali, tetapi bagi Ni Ketut Suadri kegiatan bertani ini tidak hanya dijadikannya sebagai rutinitas belaka tetapi benar-benar di lakukannya dengan sungguh-sungguh karena sampai saat ini kehidupan keluarganya mampu dipenuhi dari hasil kebunnya. Saat ini hasil produksi kebun yang paling bagus adalah dari tanaman kakaonya. Dalam beberapa tahun terakhir penghasilan dari tanaman kakao cukup menjanjikan karena selain harga yang cukup tinggi, hasil produksinya juga cukup banyak. Namun karena perubahan cuaca dan iklim sebagai dampak dari pemanasan global berpengaruh terhadap hasil produksi tanaman kakao di Bali. Sebagian besar tanaman kakao yang ada mengalami penurunan dalam produksi buahnya baik secara kualitas maupun kuantitasnya. Harga biji kakao kering yang semula bisa mencapai Rp 14.000,- per kg turus drastis sampai ke level Rp 9.000,- . Melihat hal ini Ni Ketut Suadri berusaha keras untuk memulihkan keadaan tanaman kakaonya. Tetapi karena terbatasnya dana yang dimilikinya Ni Ketut Suadri hanya bisa mengerjakannya dengan cara sederhana seperti menyiangi dan membersihkan setiap pokok tanaman kakaonya supaya kebersihannya terjaga dengan baik. Ni Ketut Suadri ingin melakukan hal yang lebih baik lagi untuk memulihkan produksi kebunnya dengan memberi pupuk dan juga penyemprotan obat pembasmi hama. Kemudian ada bantuan pinjaman modal dari DINARI dan ini dimanfaatkannya pengadaan pupuk dan obat pembasmi hama bagi tanaman kakaonya.Ni Ketut Suadri optimis, dengan adanya perawatan tanaman yang baik kondisi tanaman kakaonya akan segera pulih dan bisa menghasilkan buah lagi.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and anti-desease medicine for her cocoa trees

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for DINARI Foundation - Oct 23, 2008)

loans.name: Abdumanon

texts.en: Abdumanon R. was born in 1941 in the B.Gafurov region of Tajikistan. Mr. R. is engaged in the home business of raising and selling livestock. He has a large flock and has gained skills and knowledge from working with livestock for 30 years. His business brings in the general family income. His wife works making products from the milk produced and making yarn. Now, Mr. R. is applying to KIVA for a business development loan of $625.00 to purchase mixed fodder for his livestock.

loans.use: To purchase mixed fodder for livestock

loans.name: Mariyam

texts.en: Mariyam, 38, and her husband A. are both are farmers. Every three months they earn about $128, $42 of which is profit. Mariyam has applied for a loan of $125 to buy fertilizer and equipment. She is a member of MBK and will repay the loan within 12 months.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and equipment

loans.name: Acih Sunarsih

texts.en: Acih Sunarsih is 43 years old and her family's only means of support because her husband is currently unemployed. She makes about $40 a month raising goats near her home. She would like to expand her business by buying more goats to raise and sell, and as a member of MBK has applied for a loan of $125 to make that possible. She has agreed to repay this loan within 12 months.

loans.use: To buy more goats to raise and sell

loans.name: Itit

texts.en: Itit is 38 years old and married, but her husband S. has no regular job. To meet her family's needs, she has gone into business for herself, selling rice out of her house. On a typical day, she earns $5 and a very small profit. She has applied for a loan of $100 to expand her small business. As a member of MBK, she is committed to repay this loan within 12 months.

loans.use: To expand a rice-selling business

loans.name: Awisir

texts.en: Awisir, 46, is married but her husband S. is unemployed. To support her family, she has gone into business on her own, running a small food stall near her house where she makes $5 a day selling snacks. She has applied for a loan of $100 to expand this business. She is a member of MBK and willing to repay this loan within 12 months.

loans.use: To expand a business selling snacks

loans.name: Suamah

texts.en: Suamah, 30, is married but her husband N. does not have a regular job or a steady income. So she helps support their family by selling snacks such as noodles and instant beverages at her food stall. She earns $5 a day from her business, and brings home a small profit. She is a member of MBK and is asking for a loan of $125 to expand her business. She agrees to repay the loan within 12 months.

loans.use: To expand a food stall

loans.name: Asmanah

texts.en: Asmanah is 38 years old and married to S. B., who no longer has a job. To help her husband cover their family's expenses, she has gone into business working out of her home as a seamstress. She earns about $20 a week and generates enough profit to pay their bills. Asmanah has requested a loan of $100 to buy dress-making supplies and a sewing machine. She is a member of MBK and will repay this loan within 12 months.

loans.use: To buy dress-making supplies and a sewing machine

loans.name: Murti

texts.en: Murti M. is 41 years old and has gone into business for herself because her husband is currently unemployed. To help support their family, she sells vegetables and tofu from her house. This business brings in $10 a day and allows her to earn a very small profit. She is a member of MBK and has applied for a loan of $150 to buy more vegetables to sell to her customers, and to repair her stall. She will repay this loan within 12 months.

loans.use: To buy more vegetables to sell and to repair her stall

loans.name: Iyan

texts.en: Iyan I. is 48 years old and her family's main means of support because her husband has no regular income. To pay her family's expenses, she runs a small business selling groceries such as cooking oil. She earns about $4 a day, $2 of which is profit.  She is a member of MBK and is asking for a loan of $125 to buy new supplies to sell to her customers. She agrees to repay the loan within 12 months.

loans.use: To expand a small grocery-selling business

loans.name: Sumiati

texts.en: Sumiati S. is 40 years old and her family's sole means of support because her husband is not employed. She earns a small income making fermented cassavas, which she sells in a local market. Her income of $5 a day generates a very small profit. She is a member of MBK and has applied for a loan of $150 to expand this small business. She will repay the loan within 12 months.

loans.use: To expand a small business

loans.name: Saodat

texts.ru:
Saodat Abrobova lives in the town of Yavan. She is 49 years old, married, and has 4 children. She has high school education. She works on the market "Tijorat" in the same town - Yavan. She purchases goods in Dushanbe and resells them on the market. She has been in this business for 12 years. Since this is the main source of her income, her business is very well organized. She plans to obtain the credit to increase the assortment of her inventory by purchasing additional seasonal goods. She will be paying off the loan during the next 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer.

Арбобова Саодат Тагоевна проживает в городе Яван. Возраст 49 лет.замужем имеет 4детей. Образование среднее.Занимается торговлей на рынке « Тиджорат» города Яван. Привозит товар из города Душанбе и реализует со своей торговой точки. Опыт в данном бизнесе имеет около 12 лет. Эта деятельность является основным источником ее дохода, поэтому бизнес хорошо налажен. Планирует получить кредит для того чтобы увеличить товарооборот путем ввоза сезонного товара. Погасить кредит клиентка планирует в течении 8 месяцев.

loans.use: To increase the amount of inventory

loans.name: Olim

texts.en:
Olim S. was born in 1971 in the B.Gafurov region and he is married and has four children. Mr. S. has been a successful client of MicroInvest since 2004. He was able to repay his previous loan because of the business and income stability gained by improving his business.

His family business is making and selling the national bread named “lepeshky” and it supports his family. Mr. S. is applying to KIVA for a business development loan of $1,200 to pay for flour and a new trade outlet for selling “lepeshky.”

loans.use: To open a new trade outlet for selling “lepeshky”

loans.name: Sutinah

texts.en: Sutinah D. is 43 years old and her family's sole means of support because her husband is no longer able to work. To earn income for her family, she inflates tires with an air compressor she has at home. The income from this business is not regular, and she only occasionally earns $3 a day. She is a member of MBK, and is asking for a loan of $125 to expand her business. She will repay the loan within 12 months.

loans.use: To expand a small tire-service business

loans.name: Ni Ketut Parni

texts.id:
Still at a young age, Ni Ketut Parni is an example of tenacity when it comes to helping her husband I Ketut Royen in meeting the needs of their lives. This includes the education of their child who is still in primary school. The income her husband makes as a laborer does not meet all of the needs of their family. Hence, Ni Ketut Parni operates and manages farmland to increase her family's income. The main crop in her farmland is cocoa trees, which she still grows using traditional methods without fertilizer or pesticides. Her production is sufficient to cover her expenses. However, several months ago her production decreased because of a pest infestation and high rainfall which has prevented the cocoa trees from producing good fruit. The drop in production along with an increase in the cost of living has hit her family hard. She isn't able to purchase fertilizer or medicine to cure her plants because she does not have enough capitol. Due to this lack of funding, she is not able to get her cocoa trees to produce fruit at their maximal rate. She hopes that a with a loan, she will be able to purchase the fertilizer and plant medicine that will allow her to produce good cocoa fruit again.

Translated from Bahasa Indonesia by Courtenay Teska Race, Kiva Volunteer.

Dalam usia yang masih cukup muda Ni Ketut Parni menunjukkan keuletannya dalam membantu suaminya I Ketut Royen dalam memenuhi segala keperluan hidup mereka, baik itu untuk di dapur maupun biaya-biaya lainnya termasuk biaya pendidikan anaknya yang masih di sekolah dasar. Penghasilan suaminya yang bekerja sebagai buruh tidak mampu memenuhi semua kebutuhan keluarga mereka, sehingga Ni Ketut Parni berusaha semaksimal mungkin mengusahakan pengelolaan kebunnya untuk bisa menambah pemasukan keluarganya. Kebun yang dimilikinya dominan dengan tanaman kakao yang masih dipelihara dangan cara tradisional tanpa penambahan pupuk ataupun obat-obatan pembasmi hama. Hasil produksi yang diperoleh cukup untuk bisa menutupi pengeluaran-pengeluaran yang ada. Namun dalam beberapa bulan terakhir jumlah produksi tanaman kakaonya menurun karena serangan hama dan tingginya curah hujan yang menyebabkan tanaman kakaonya tidak bisa memproduksi buah yang bagus sehingga pendapatannya juga jauh berkurang sedangkan biaya hidup semakin bertambah. Untuk pengadaan pupuk ataupun obat pembasmi hama tidak bisa dilakukannya karena terbatasnya modal yang dimiliki, sehingga perawatan atas tanaman kakaonya tidak bisa dilakukan dengan maksimal. Kemudian DINARI memberinya bantuan modal usaha dan itu dimanfaatkannya untuk membeli pupuk dan juga obat pembasmi hama, dengan harapan tanaman kakaonya bisa menghasilkan buah yang baik.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and anti-desease medicine for her cocoa trees

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for DINARI Foundation - Oct 23, 2008)

loans.name: Sokinamoh.

texts.ru:
Sokinamoh R. lives in the town of Yavan. She is 45 years old, she is married, and has children. Sokinamoh has a high school education. She works on the market "Tijorat." She purchases goods from the city of Dushanbe and resells them on the market. She has been in this business for the last 10 years. This is the main source of income for her family and for that reason it is structured and functions very well. She plans to obtain the loan to increase the amount of inventory by purchasing more seasonal goods. She plans to pay off the loan within 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer.

Рахимова Сокинамох Сохибназаровна проживает в городе Яван. Возраст 45 лет.замужем имеет 4детей. Образование среднее.Занимается торговлей на рынке « Тиджорат» города Яван. Привозит товар из города Душанбе и реализует со своей торговой точки. Опыт в данном бизнесе имеет около 10 лет. Эта деятельность является основным источником ее дохода, поэтому бизнес хорошо налажен. Планирует получить кредит для того чтобы увеличить товарооборот путем ввоза сезонного товара. Погасить кредит клиентка планирует в течении 10 месяцев.

loans.use: To increase the amount of inventory

loans.name: Rohilah

texts.en: Rohilah A. is 24 years old and lives with her husband, who makes a small income selling flavored ices door-to-door. Rohilah is a seamstress who makes about $10 a day working at home. She is a member of MBK and has applied for a loan of $175 to expand her small business. She has agreed to repay this loan within a period of 12 months.

loans.use: To expand a small tailoring business

loans.name: Wati

texts.en: Wati Y. is 42 years old and her family's sole means of support because her husband is no longer able to work. Every day she gathers dry grass and sells it to an agent who resells it as animal food. Wati does not have a regular income and sometimes earns as little as $2 a day. She is a member of MBK and has applied for a loan of $150 to expand her business. She will repay the loan within one year.

loans.use: To expand a small business

loans.name: Siti Maimunah

texts.id:
Siti Maemunah is a housewife who must work hard for her family's wellbeing. Her husband used to be a driver, but he is now completely blind in both of his eyes due to nerve damage. Besides supporting her family by buying and selling second-hand goods & recyclables, Siti Maemunah also has a store where she sells snacks and drinks. Times are very difficult right now because she is not making enough to support their family. All of the profits she makes from her store go into making her snacks. She has one child who is not married and two grandchildren that live with her since their parents have gone to work Java. Seeing the situation, Siti Maemunah wishes to grow her business by selling bakso (meatball soup) and nasi goreng (fried rice). To accomplish this she would like to borrow 1,000,000 Rupiah for her business. She hopes with this loan she will be able to grow her business and better support her family and be able to send her two grandchildren to school.

Translated from Bahasa Indonesia by Courtenay Teska Race, Kiva Volunteer.

Siti Maemunah seorang ibu rumah tangga yang harus bekerja keras untuk menghidupi keluarganya. Suaminya yang dulu seorang sopir kini mengalami kebutaan secara total pada kedua matanya karena kerusakan pada syaraf. Selain menjalankan usaha keluarga yaitu jual beli ban bekas, Siti Maemunah juga mempunyai usaha warung yang menjual minuman ringan dan makanan ringan. Hal ini dilakukan karena usaha keluarga tidak mencukupi untuk biaya sehari-hari yang harus dikeluarkan. Keuntungan yang diperoleh dari usaha warung ini dipakai untuk keperluan dapurnya. Karena Siti Maemunah menanggung satu orang anak yang belum menikah dan juga dua orang cucunya yang ditinggal oleh orangtuanya ke Jawa. Melihat situasi yang memungkinkan untuk usaha warung tersebut maka Siti Maemunah berkeinginan untuk menambah usahanya dengan berjualan bakso dan nasi goreng. Makanya Siti Maemunah minta pendampingan dan pinjaman modal dari Dinari sebesar Rp.1.000.000 untuk usahanya ini. Siti Maemunah berharap dengan bertambahnya usaha ini, maka keuntungan yang diperoleh pun semakin bertambah dan kebutuhan keluarga bisa terpenuhi,sehingga kedua cucunya pun bisa menikmati bangku sekolah.

loans.use: to purchase more drinks and snacks to sell in her store

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for DINARI Foundation - Oct 23, 2008)

loans.name: Mernih

texts.en: Mernih A. is 35 years old and her family's sole means of support because her husband is unable to work. She makes a living selling vegetables such as spinach from her stall in the local market, where she earns about $10 a day and takes home a very small profit. She is a member of MBK and is seeking a loan of $125 to buy more vegetables and expand her business. She has agreed to repay this loan within 12 months.

loans.use: To expand a vegetable-selling business

loans.name: Emah

texts.en: Emah is 23 years old and married to M.. She and her husband both make bamboo matting for a living. They earn $60.00 a month. Emah is a member of MBK and is asking for a loan of $125.00, which she will repay within twelve months. She will use this loan to buy more bamboo.

loans.use: To buy more bamboo

loans.name: Satuni

texts.en: Satuni is 62 years old and married to A.. Her husband doesn't work anymore so she must work by herself to earn income for the family and her children's education. She sells vegetables at her house, earning $10.00 a day. She is asking for a loan of $150.00 to expand her business. As a member of MBK, she is willing to repay this loan within twelve months.

loans.use: To expand her business

loans.name: Jubaidah

texts.en: Jubaidah is 36 years old and married to A.. Her husband has no fixed job, so Jubaidah must work to support her family's needs. Everyday, she goes door-to-door to sell kids and adult clothing on credit. She can earn up to $10.00 a day with only a very small profit. She is a member of MBK and is asking for a loan of $125.00 to buy more clothes to sell. She agrees to repay this loan within twelve months.

loans.use: To buy more clothes to sell

loans.name: Ashurhol

texts.ru:
Ashurhol I. lives in the city of Yavan. He is 52 years old, is married and has 6 children. He has a university diploma. Ashurhol is a teacher and works in school number 45 of Yavan. He also sells farm animals. He buys young calves, feeds them for 40-45 days and then sells them at the markets. This business is a decent source of income for the client. Moreover, Ashurhol sells calves to butchers who provide the city's markets with valuable fresh meat at affordable prices. The client plans to use the loan in order to purchase another calf. He plans to repay the loan within 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Anna Startseva, Kiva volunteer.

Иброгимов Ашурхол Юсупович проживает в городе Яван.Возраст 52 года,женат ,имеет 6 детей. Образование высшее. По специальности учитель.Работает в средней школе № 45 города Явана. Занимается торговлей крупнорогатого скота. Скупает бычков молодых, откармливает около 40-45 дней , а затем продает на тех же рынках. Данный бизнес является неплохим источником дохода для семьи клиента. кроме того он продает бычков мясникам , которые обеспечивают рынки города полноценным и свежим мясом , к тому же по доступным ценам. Клиент планирует получить кредит для того чтобы купить дополнительно еще одного бычка. погасить кредит клиент планирует в течении 12 месяцев.

loans.use: To purchase a calf

loans.name: Maeroh

texts.en: Maeroh is 43 years old and married to M. A.. Her husband does not work anymore so Maeroh must work by herself to earn income for her family. Everyday, she carries her bamboo basket door-to-door to sell vegetables. She earns $10.00 a day. She is a member of MBK and is asking for a loan of $125.00 to buy more vegetables and expand her business. She will repay this loan within twelve months.

loans.use: To buy more vegetables

loans.name: Chinigul

texts.ru:
Chinigul F. lives in the city of Yavan. She is 42 years old. Chinigul is a widow with 3 children. She has finished high school. Chinigul has her own business. She sews traditional clothing. She has 10 years of experience in this sphere. Chinigul plans to use the loan in order to purchase supplies for her work (beads, thread and material). The client plans to repay the loan within 15 months.

Translated from Russian by Anna Startseva, Kiva volunteer.

Фатхуллоева Чинигуль проживает в городе Яван. возраст 42 года.Вдова имеет 3 детей.Образование среднее. Работает частным предпринимателем в сфере производства. Занимается золотошитьем национальной одежды. Шьет на заказ. Опыт работы в данной сфере около 10 лет. Планирует получить кредит для покупки необходимого материала для работы ( бисер, нитки, ткани). Погасить кредит клиентка в течении 15 месяцев.

loans.use: Purchase of supplies

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
This is 40 year-old Anna S.. She is single with two children, aged 10 and 15, and has two other dependents, who live with her because their parents died of HIV/AIDS.

In 1983, Anna established a general store and clothing business. Working 9 to 12 hours a day, seven days a week, and assisted by her brother and one employee, she earns about $170 per month from this business. Anna has already received and successfully repaid one loan from SELFINA, and now requires a new loan in order to purchase additional stock in bulk.

Anna thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To purchase additional stock for her general store and clothing business.

loans.name: Kumri

texts.ru:
Kumri A. lives in the city of Yavan. She is 49 years old, married and has 7 children. Kumri has a high school diploma. She takes care of the house and her business is cattle rearing. Kumri has a cow; the milk from this cow is used for the family and also for sale. She sells milk at a market to whole sale buyers. Kumri plans to purchase one more cow in order to increase the volume of milk, thereby increasing her profits. If there is additional milk, Kumri would be able to sell more and receive greater income. She plans to repay the loan within 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Anna Startseva, Kiva volunteer.

Алиева Кумри жительница города Яван. Возраст 49 лет ,замужем имеет 7 детей. Образование среднее. Домохозяйка занимается животноводством. имеет корову, молоко которой использует для семьи и на продажу. Продает молоко на рынке оптовым покупателям. планирует купить еще одну корову для того чтобы увеличить объем получаемого молока, тем самым увеличив свои доходы. то есть если у нее будет дополнительное молоко она сможет продавать больше и получать больший доход. погасить кредитклиентка планирует в течении 12 месяцев.

loans.use: To purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Tulkinjon

texts.en: Tulkinjon U. was born in 1976 in the Asht region and he is married and has five children. He became a client of MicroInvest in 2008 because he trusts the MicroInvest loan procedure. For this family business, he raises and sells livestock, and his wife works making products from sour milk. Mr. U. has a rather large flock and is applying for a business development loan of $625.00 to buy one more pedigreed bull. This will permit him to increase the flock number and to increase the family income to give his children a good education.

loans.use: To purchase a pedigreed bull

loans.name: Marhabo

texts.ru:
Marhabo F. lives in the city of Yavan. She is 31 years old, is married and has 4 children. She has a high school diploma and is a teacher in school number 12 in Yavan. Aside from being a teacher, she raises farm animals. Yavan has milk cows and sells milk and yogurt products (kefir and yogurt). She sells milk to whole sale purchasers who then take these products to Dushanbe city. Marhabo would like to receive a loan in order to purchase one more cow. This will give her an opportunity to increase her profits. Marhabo's business supports her family. Moreover, by selling milk she provides markets with fresh milk and yogurt products at affordable prices. She plans to repay her loan within 12 months..

Translated from Russian by Anna Startseva, Kiva volunteer.

Фатхуллоева Мархабо проживает в городе Яван. Возраст 31 год, замужем , имеет 4 детей. Oбразование средне-специальное. по профессии учитель средней школы № 12 города Яван. Кроме того занимается животноводством. Держит дойных коров для того ,чтобы продавать молоко и кисломолочные продукты(кефир и кислое молоко). Продает молоко оптовым покупателям , которые вывозят продукты в город Душанбе. Планирует получить кредит для того чтобы купить еще одну корову. Это даст возможность увеличить доход. Ее деятельность позволяет обеспечивать свою семью. А так же продавая молоко она обеспечивает рынки свежими молочными продуктами по доступным ценам.погасить кредит клиентка планирует в течении 12 месяцев..

loans.use: To purchase a milk cow

loans.name: Hadija

texts.en:
This is 47 year-old Hadija S.. She is married with three children, aged 10, 18, and 24, and has two other dependents, who live with her because their parents live in a remote area.

In 2002, Hadija established a café and take-away shop. Working more than 16 hours a day, seven days a week, and assisted by her two employees, she earns about $60 per month from this business. Hadija has already received and successfully repaid two loans from SELFINA, and now requires a new loan in order to purchase stocks of soft drink, milk, chicken, and other ingredients, in bulk. In the future, Hadija also plans to open another business.

When you see a SELFINA entrepreneur whose business title is ‘restaurant’ or ‘café’, you may have to adjust your mental image of what that is. A local restaurant or café in Tanzania usually consists of a rough wooden table and some long, wooden benches, with the sky as a ceiling. Such places don’t even appear in the Lonely Planet’s budget guide, but if you’re looking for a cheap and tasty meal, and someone to have a chat with, this is the place to be. The food is all local; rice, ugali (a hot sticky dough, made from maize flour), plantain (a cooked savoury banana), all served with beans, vegetables, meat, and a variety of yummy sauces.

loans.use: To purchase stocks of soft drink, milk, chicken, and other ingredients, in bulk.

loans.name: Angela

texts.en:
This is 37 year-old Angela K.. She is married with three children, aged 9, 13, and 15.

In 2006 Angela established a poultry business, and now requires a loan in order to purchase additional chicks to raise and sell. Raising kuku is a popular micro-business in Tanzania, especially amongst SELFINA clients. ("Kuku" means "chickens" in Swahili.)

Angela thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To purchase additional chicks to raise and sell.

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en:
Emmanuel B. is a 45-year-old married father of six. He has been an auto-mechanic for the past 10 years. His wife is a seamstress. He is requesting $275 to buy spare car parts for sale and to use in repairs.

Emmanuel is also a member of a lending group called “Wisdom Group”, which consists of 14 members in Cape Coast, Ghana.

loans.use: To buy spare car parts for sale and to use in repairs.

loans.name: Safarali

texts.ru:
Safarali T. lives in the city of Yavan. He is 40, married and has 4 children. He has a high school diploma with a specialization in mechanics. Professionally, he is trained in fixing plumbing equipment and he makes his living by offering this service. This is the only source of income for his family. Safarali would like to receive a loan in order to purchase technical equipment (welding equipment, etc). Moreover, in this region there are few technicians trained to offer this service, therefore additional equipment would provide better services to the people. Safarali plans to repay the loan within 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Anna Startseva, Kiva volunteer.

Туйдиев Сафарали проживает в городе Яван. Возраст 40 лет, женат имеет 4 детей. Образование средне-техническое. По профессии сантехник. Зарабатывает на жизнь путем оказания сантехнических услуг. Работает по найму. Это единственный источник дохода его семьи. Планирует получить кредит для приобретения технического оборудования( сварочный аппарат идр.) Кроме того мастеров такого рода в районе мало поэтому занимаясь данным делом он дает возможность населению пользоваться данными услугами. Погасить кредит клиент планирует в течении 12 месяцев.

loans.use: To purchase equipment

loans.name: Rajabaly

texts.ru:
Rajabaly S. lives in the city of Yavan. He is 38 years old, is married and has 5 children. He has finished high school. Rajabaly currently sells fruits and vegetables at the market called "Mehrgon". He purchases produce from wholesale traders and then sells it in smaller quantities. He has been in this business for about 8 years. This is the only source of income for his family, which is why Rajabaly never misses the opportunity to make more money. With his loan he plans to increase the volume of goods. Rajabaly plans to repay his loan within 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Anna Startseva, Kiva volunteer.

Сулаймонов Раджабали проживает в городе Яван. Возраст 38 лет , женат имеет 5 детей. Образование среднее, занимается торговлей фруктов и овощей на рынке "Мехргон" . Скупает товар у оптовых реализаторов и продает в розницу. Занимается этим видом бизнеса около 8 лет. Это единственный источник дохода у его семьи , поэтому он не упускает никакой возможности заработать больше. Планирует получить кредит для того чтобы увеличить товарооборот. Погасить кредит клиент планирует в течении 12 месяцев.

loans.use: Increase the volume of produce

loans.name: Comfort

texts.en:
Comfort A. is a married mother of five children. She helps support her family and her husband, who is a mason, by selling plantains. Plantains are very popular in Ghana and are used to prepare a dish called “Fufu”.

Comfort is requesting $275 to buy plantains in bulk.

Comfort is also a member of a lending group called “Wisdom Group”, which consists of 14 members in Cape Coast, Ghana.

loans.use: To buy plantains in bulk.

loans.name: Aman Allah

texts.en: Aman Allah lives in district 8 of Kabul, Afghanistan. He is single. Aman Allah has a metal shop. He has been working in this business for more than 3 years. He is very hard worker and he wants to enlarge his business, so he wants to take an individual loan to increase his inventory. He hopes to become better able to make good income to help his family and make a better future for himself.

loans.use: To buy inventory for his metal shop

loans.name: Saodat

texts.ru:
Saodat A. lives in the Abdurahmon Jomi region. She is 52 years old, divorced and has 2 children. She finished college and is a school teacher by profession. Saodat works in the market "Iftihor" where she sells clothes. She has 2 years of experience in this field. She purchases goods from the city of Dushanbe and sells them on the market. This ensures that local markets have goods, which means that locals do not have to spend money in order to travel to Dushanbe and purchase goods there. Besides, this business provides additional support to Saodat's family. She plans to repay the loan within 10 months.

Translated from Russian by Anna Startseva, Kiva volunteer.

Абдукаримова Саодат проживает в районе Абдурахмони Джоми. Возраст 52 года , разведена имеет 2 детей. Образование высшее. По профессии учитель средней школы. Работает в кишлачном совете " Ифтихор". Занимается торговлей одежды. Опыт работы в данной сфере около 2 лет. Привозит товар из города Душанбе и продает на районом рынке .Это позволяет обеспечивать рынки района товаром , что позволяет населению не тратить деньги на дорогу , чтобы ехать за покупками в город Душанбе. Кроме того этот бизнес дает дополнительный доход ее семье. Погасить кредит клиет планирует в течении 10 месяцев.

loans.use: To increase the volume of goods

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace B. is married and has five children. Her husband is a teacher.

Grace runs a local road-side restaurant which specializes in “Banku”, a traditional Ghanaian dish made by soaking maize for three days in water then mixing it into dough which is then served with stew. She is requesting $525 to buy additional products to stock her restaurant.

Grace is also a member of a lending group called “Wisdom Group”, which consists of 14 members in Cape Coast, Ghana.

loans.use: To buy additional products to stock her restaurant.

loans.name: Parween's Group

texts.en:
I am the group leader for two other women: Basheera B. and Khalida B.. Basheera B. will invest her share of our loan in their sack trading business and Khalida B. needs this loan for their cloth manufacturing business.

I have lived all my life in Multan, a city famous for its pottery. I am married and the mother of four boys. All my kids are above 14. One of my sons operates a video game shop. He started this shop two years ago by borrowing from Asasah, a microfinance institution. Now he has also added sales of cold drinks to his shop. This year my son wants to buy an additional video game for his shop. With the extra profits, I plan to help my son marry next year.

loans.use: Buy an additional video game for my son's video game centre

loans.name: Tahir

texts.en: F. Tahir, 44 years old, is married with four school aged children . He has been involved in the business of baking the national bread, called “lepeshka,” for the last 10 years. Tahir is the main income earner for the family, but his wife helps him when possible. The materials for the business are usually purchased by Tahir in the local market. Over the years, he has developed both wholesale and retail customers for his product, selling to restaurants and cafes, as well as individuals in the central market of the city.  He requests $900.00  for the term of 12 months to purchase more flour and coal in order to expand his lepeshka baking business. Tahir would like to thank everyone for supporting him and promises to repay the loan in a timely manner.

loans.use: To purchase the coal and flour required for baking the national bread, “lepeshka.”

loans.name: Mumtaz's Group

texts.en:
My name is Mumtaz S. N. from Multan, a mid-size city in Pakistan. I own a four-room brick house herein Multan. I have four kids: three boys and one girl. All of my kids are under 12 and attend a local school. My husband works in a public corporation for meager income. I am a textile designer and I create embroidered dresses.

I want to expand my business and therefore require a loan. My loan group is comprised of three other women all of whom are hardworking entrepreneurs. Sabra B. needs this loan to expand her fruit business. Nighat B. is borrowing for her husband’s paint business. Tasneem B. is borrowing for her family’s restaurant.

loans.use: Expand embroidered clothes business

loans.name: Muhabbat

texts.ru:
Muhabbat M. lives in the city of Tursun-zoda. She is 51 years old, is married with 5 children and has a high school diploma. Muhabbat has an agricultural business. She owns a piece of land where she plants wheat. She wants to obtain a loan in order to purchase wheat seeds and fertilizer. She plans to repay the loan within 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Anna Startseva, Kiva volunteer.

Мирзоева Мухаббат Умбаровна проживает в городе Турсунзаде. Возраст 51 год. Замужем имеет 5 детей.Образование среднее.Домохозяйка, занимается сельским хозяйством.
